name: Essence of Seoul. Sinchon, where everything started.
description: Sinchon, the neighbourhood where my adventure started. Let me show you one of the most active and amazing places in Korea!. Well know by its famous universities, I will show you a different Sinchon. If you are on a budget, but you want to enjoy as if you were millionarie, I won't dissapoint you with this trip. Would you like to come with me?
